known_issues: Loading spinner/wheel is missing or not visible (user asked: "where is the spinner").

existing_features.title: Ensure the spinner is clearly visible when the user taps the Spin button (during `isSpinning` / `showEffects` states), including when the button is disabled. The spinner and the "Spinning..." label must not be faded out by disabled styling in dark mode.

Standardize wheel loading feedback so users always see an obvious loading indicator while the wheel image is loading (or slow to load), and it remains visible until the wheel image is actually rendered.

projectName: Make the spinning/loading spinner visible during wheel spins
